title: Landing Page Layout Configuration
description: Defines the layout and components for a specific step (desktop or mobile). Supports template string interpolation with state values.

state.description: Initial/default state for this layout. Automatically merged with persisted state (persisted state takes precedence). Layout state is the base, persisted changes override it.

sections.description: List of sections/components to render in this layout

id.description: Unique ID for this section (used for anchor links and component identification)

component.description: Name of the component to render. Match key in ComponentMap.ts (Hero, Navigation, Footer, Accordion, Testimonials, Cart) or use 'StepContent' for virtual step-specific layout injection.

props.description: Props to pass to the component (optional for components that don't require configuration). Supports template string interpolation: {{state.path.to.value}} (e.g., {{state.cart.items}}, {{state.cart.totalPrice}})

actions.description: Action handlers for component events (e.g., button clicks)

^[a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*$.description: Action configuration for a specific event

action.description: Base action structure - additional properties depend on action type
